title: THERE IS A GOD!!
body:
And they listen to our prayers!
https://i.gyazo.com/661f8a15d2b7faae8b2297b968a8687e.png

**Hallelujah!!**

Note the distinct lack of specific colour tone _fe1415_, also known as god-awful-vomitworthy-shit-ass-red:
https://i.gyazo.com/95ed678a55d2273f9beabf05448fbb66.png

See how a tiny bit of effort makes all the difference:
https://i.gyazo.com/64ed6fda0634bf256cc19280ad016be7.jpg

Theres a lesson to be learned here _(albeit one that we learn at age 5)_:
Do something once, and do it properly, 
and then you don't have to come back and do it again.

I don't mean to sound patronising, I am **incredibly** grateful that this change has occurred! _(more than you know)_.
And I thank you from the bottom of my heart! But there is lingering salt simply because that red cr*p-stain should never have been allowed to make it to live servers in the first place...


Thank you oh Rito-gods!
For listening to our prayers 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Yay!!!!

All that rooting for you worked out! I'm glad they fixed that visual nuisance on Azir ❤

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} 

Next thing we need to do is make a petition for Eve and Azir stickers or emotes ❤ ❤ ❤

Thanks ^^

Im happy xD It makes his rework wayyy more tolerable :P

> Next thing we need to do is make a petition for Eve and Azir stickers or emotes ❤ ❤ ❤


This is essential!!

God, I hate Azir. What a cancerous champ. No mana costs, half-lane poke.

CANCER chaAMp
